articles.author: Adam Sabes
articles.title: Florida-bound American Airlines plane drops 15,000 feet in 3 minutes: 'It was terrifying' - Fox Business
articles.description: An American Airlines flight headed to Florida reportedly dropped over 15,000 feet in a matter of three minutes, according to flight records.
articles.content:
An American Airlines plane headed to Florida dropped over 15,000 feet in a matter of three minutes, flight records indicate.
